summary: This is an internal email from a prosecutor in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, forwarding a defense motion filed by attorney Bruce Barket. The motion seeks a hearing regarding video footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), where Jeffrey Epstein was held before his death.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Filed a motion on behalf of his client seeking a hearing on MCC video footage related to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased defendant whose incarceration and death at the MCC is the subject of the requested hearing.

connections.description: Barket filed a legal motion concerning video evidence from the facility where his client, Epstein, was held.

events.title: Filing of Defense Motion for Hearing
events.description: Defense attorney Bruce Barket files a motion seeking a hearing on video footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

keyFacts: A defense motion was filed by attorney Bruce Barket on January 13, 2020, seeking a hearing regarding MCC video footage.
The motion relates to the incarceration and death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The email is internal correspondence from a prosecutor in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating an ongoing legal process post-Epstein's death.
